scripts.dev: concurrently "(cd ui && npm run build-watch)" "(cd server && npm run tsc-watch)" "(nodemon index.js)"
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-ui: cd ui && npm run build && cd..
scripts.start: npm-recursive-install --skip-root --production && npm run build-server && npm run build-ui && node index.js
